articles.title: Pokémon Go Eevee Community Day Classic guide - Polygon
articles.description: Pokémon Go’s Eevee Community Day event features the evolution Pokémon. Our guide lists out perks and how to find a shiny.
articles.content:
Pokémon Go is having an Eevee Community Day Classic event on both July 5 and 6 from 2-5 p.m. in your local time.
